name: Grabarz & Partner
description: Grabarz & Partner is an independent and owner-managed advertising agency, one of the most creative agencies in Germany and the world. More than 220 employees are responsible for national and international budgets, including Volkswagen, IKEA, Burger King, DEVK and Melitta. In 2015, Grabarz & Partner is the most widely-acclaimed German agency at the Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity and the creative number one at the German Art Directors Club Awards.
